r: Would you rather have the ability to know everyone's deepest secrets or the power to erase one memory from anyone?
Would you rather have the ability to have mind-blowing sex but never find true love or have a loving relationship but mediocre sex?
Would you rather be extremely wealthy but hated by everyone or poor but loved by all?
Would you rather have a threesome with two strangers or with your partner and someone you both know?
Would you rather always know when someone is lying or always get away with lying?
Would you rather have the power to make anyone fall in love with you or the power to bring back someone from the dead?
Would you rather have unlimited money but be constantly stressed or live comfortably but never have financial worries?
Would you rather have an average life expectancy with guaranteed happiness or live forever with occasional bouts of extreme sadness?
